questions.question: What are Zeros of a transfer function:

answers.a: Roots of polynomial of the numerator of transfer function
answers.b: Roots of polynomial of the denominator of transfer function

questions.question: What are Poles of a transfer function:

answers.a: Roots of polynomial of the numerator of transfer function
answers.b: Roots of polynomial of the denominator of transfer function

questions.question: What is DC gain of transfer function:

answers.a: Roots of polynomial of the numerator of transfer function
answers.b: Roots of polynomial of the denominator of transfer function
answers.c: The magnitude  of transfer function on putting s = 0
